item.title: Bottlenecks
item.description: ## Pricing resources Gas refers to the unit that measures the amount of computational effort required to execute specific operations on the Ethereum network.
item.content:
## Pricing resources

Gas refers to the unit that measures the amount of computational effort required to execute specific operations on the Ethereum network.
